content: encountering an issue where bindgen is generating a C union with random data, that only affects apple silicon. i wrote up a post on URLO and curious if anyone has thoughts about what could be going wrong https://users.rust-lang.org/t/on-apple-silicon-bindgen-union-is-constructed-with-random-data/54469
the underlying issue has been discovered and wrote up here: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-bindgen/issues/1973#issuecomment-764756997
tldr: bindgen + c unions with floats + aarch64 isn't working
